author: jkarancs
body:
Threshold and resolution measurements in data suggested the need to increase the simulated pixel threshold values for Layer 1 and 2 for the new phase 1 detector.
This PR contains:
* Updated L1 thresholds: increase from 2000 to 3000 electrons
* Updated L2 thresholds: increase from 2000 to 2600 electrons
* Also implement the missing configuration parameter for the latter

The expected impact on physics will be a slight worsening of pixel related tracking quantities which will better match what we see now in data.

The PR will need to go together with updated conditions for Templates (and likely also Lorentz Angle), which we are preparing now.

Validation results based on data and simulation (including this PR) are attached in a pdf below.

[2017_10_06_ThresholdUpdate.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/1362365/2017_10_06_ThresholdUpdate.pdf)
title: 94X Update phase1 pixel thresholds
